programme.title: Slender Man
programme.desc: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one of them mysteriously goes missing.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail
programme.desc: Escaping the hustle and bustle of Sydney, Luke visits the Blue Mountains in New South Wales. Overlooking the majestic ranges, Luke cooks seared Lamb Cutlets with an Asian Salsa Verde, and meets up with his old friend Huong to have an Eastern high tea. Utilising the local produce, Luke cooks a pan seared Quail at Echoes Restaurant. He meets with the top chefs from the area and discovers their signature dishes.

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: The Top End of Australia has some of the best, freshest seafood in the country and in this episode Jimmy will show you why. Jimmy tells us that it was his search for Silver Barramundi that brought him to Darwin 29 years ago. He loved the place so much he decided to pick up his life and move. Jimmy takes us to meet one of his closest friends, long time fisherman Billy Boustead who lives at Shoal Bay outside Darwin.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Teddies
programme.desc: After jumping on their bed and breaking it, Tizzy and Sparky ask Dom for help to fix it. However, instead of telling him the truth, they tell him that it was the wind that broke it. Today, Tizzy wants to do lots of things. She keeps herself busy with one thing after another without taking a break - until she reaches the point where she's too tired to even play with her friends.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2
programme.desc: Bibi is so excited about her new mobile phone that she ignores Hiccup and Sneeze. She can't stop texting, playing games on it, and taking selfies and photos of food.

programme.title: Tall Tales
programme.desc: Senecio should have already been back from vacation. Thistle, worried, sets out to find him along with Apollo and Larry.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S6
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Counting with Paula S7
programme.desc: The children play Limbo in the playroom, but Calc is too small to play. The children meet their friends to find ways for Calc to grow, but he soon realises that being big may not be as fun as he had imagined. Captain Redbeard is looking for a new pirate assistant in exchange for a brand new ATV! Tim and Calc compete to become Redbeard's new assistant fiercely. Is their friendship worth sacrificing?

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S1
programme.desc: The Rangers have to stop a factory owner from polluting a local stream. The Rangers have to save Preston and Patty from a tsunami.

programme.title: Zoom The White Dolphin S1
programme.desc: An eco-friendly series about every child's dream: having a dolphin as best friend!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: Our heroes face a challenge of unfathomable proportions, and the fate of Galar hangs in the balance!

programme.title: What On Earth
programme.desc: Spectacular Music Ians is launched and no one is watching it. Undefeated, Leonardo decides that the way to success is to get Chad Mando, the coolest kid in class, on the case. Sure enough, Chad to shares it on TikTok! Zachary realizes that this will attract enormous attention to the aliens and their weirdness! He urges Raffles to force the 2 aliens to take the video down.

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how special effects are created? In this episode, our Try-ers learn how to create illusions and make object floats on screen!

programme.title: DENVER The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends Of Awesomeness S1
programme.desc: The further adventures of Po the Dragon Warrior and his friends.

programme.desc: Alaska: A Year in the Wild - Winter in Alaska, the animals must battle to survive. Those creatures that face it head-on must show ingenuity and resilience if they're to see the spring shoots reappear. For the next seven months, they must battle each other and the elements just to stay alive.

programme.desc: The episodes cover the most extreme weather action caught on camera. We learn from survivors who have beaten the odds to overcome the most treacherous weather conditions imaginable. The series also shows how for on-air meteorologists, being on the front lines of Mother Nature is never easy and sometimes the reporter covering the story becomes the story.

programme.desc: In this episode Chris Packham unravels some of nature's oddest events. A deep sea blob spotted in the Gulf of Mexico that mystified oil rig workers and sent the internet in to frenzy, the washed up remains of a gargantuan creature that baffled scientists for decades, and a stow away spider with a set of unfathomable feet, an Octopus who's behaviour was so extraordinary that nobody believed it was real, the curious case of bright blue frogs appearing in pools in Germany and more.

Then, with the executive chef at the Spirit House, Luke cooks grilled kingfish with a Thai influence.

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: This week Jimmy heads 500km east of Darwin to the remote Arnhem Land coastal community of Maningrida. Jimmy visits Maningrida Wild Foods and goes out harvesting with local landowners for various bush foods that are now sold commercially. Traditional owner Leila Nimbadja shares stories from her childhood and takes Jimmy to hunt for long yam. Jimmy catches up with Don Wilton, one of only a few people in the Northern Territory with an Aboriginal Coastal Fishing Licence.

Traditional owner Leila Nimbadja shares stories from her childhood and takes Jimmy to hunt for long yam. Jimmy catches up with Don Wilton, one of only a few people in the Northern Territory with an Aboriginal Coastal Fishing Licence.
